## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PRX44</u>
- **Gene Name:** 
- **Description:**   Peroxidase superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [prx01,44,73]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Shorter root hairs, 50% reduced root peroxidase activity; root hair tips have lower levels of cytROS but increased apoROS accumulation.
